name: PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF INTERNAL MEDICINE and Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D., v. INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, HIGHMARK, INC., Intervenor. Appeal of Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D.
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Society of Internal Medicine v. Insurance Department, Highmark, Inc.

parties: PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF INTERNAL MEDICINE and Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D., v. INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, HIGHMARK, INC., Intervenor. Appeal of Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of January, 1999, the direct appeal is quashed; the matter is treated as a petition for allowance of appeal and denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
723 A.2d 173
PENNSYLVANIA SOCIETY OF INTERNAL MEDICINE and Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D., v. INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, HIGHMARK, INC., Intervenor. Appeal of Robert B. Sklaroff, M.D.
No. 196 M.D. 1998.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 21, 1999.
